Grammar.name: Fortune Cookie
Grammar.author: Lance Boudreaux
Grammar.description: Pulls a fortune from inside of a fortune cookie

tables.table: Roll | Fortune 002 | The man or woman you desire feels the same about you. 003 | Meeting adversity well is the source of your strength. 004 | A dream you have will come true. 005 | Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds. 006 | Never give up. You're not a failure if you don't give up. 007 | You will become great if you believe in yourself. 008 | There is no greater pleasure than seeing your loved ones prosper. 009 | You will marry your lover. 010 | A very attractive person has a message for you. 011 | You already know the answer to the questions lingering inside your head. 012 | It is now, and in this world, that we must live. 013 | You must try, or hate yourself for not trying. 014 | You can make your own happiness. 015 | The greatest risk is not taking one. 016 | The love of your life is stepping into your planet this summer. 017 | Love can last a lifetime, if you want it to. 018 | Adversity is the parent of virtue. 019 | Serious trouble will bypass you. 020 | A short stranger will soon enter your life with blessings to share. 021 | Now is the time to try something new. 022 | Wealth awaits you very soon. 023 | If you feel you are right, stand firmly by your convictions. 024 | If winter comes, can spring be far behind? 025 | Keep your eye out for someone special. 026 | You are very talented in many ways. 027 | A stranger, is a friend you have not spoken to yet. 028 | A new voyage will fill your life with untold memories. 029 | You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime. 030 | Your ability for accomplishment will follow with success. 031 | Nothing astonishes men so much as common sense and plain dealing. 032 | Its amazing how much good you can do if you don't care who gets the credit. 033 | Everyone agrees. You are the best. 034 | Life consist not in holding good cards, but in playing those you hold well. 035 | Jealousy doesn't open doors, it closes them! 036 | It's better to be alone sometimes. 037 | When fear hurts you, conquer it and defeat it! 038 | Let the deeds speak. 039 | You will be called in to fulfill a position of high honor and responsibility. 040 | The man on the top of the mountain did not fall there. 041 | You will conquer obstacles to achieve success. 042 | Joys are often the shadows, cast by sorrows. 043 | Fortune favors the brave. 044 | An upward movement initiated in time can counteract fate. 045 | A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. 046 | Sometimes you just need to lay on the floor. 047 | Never give up. Always find a reason to keep trying. 048 | If you have something worth fighting for, then fight for it. 049 | Stop wishing. Start doing. 050 | Accept your past without regrets. Handle your present with confidence. Face your future without fear. 051 | Stay true to those who would do the same for you. 052 | Ask yourself if what you are doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow. 053 | Happiness is an activity. 054 | Help is always needed but not always appreciated. Stay true to your heart and help those in need weather they appreciate it or not. 055 | Hone your competitive instincts. 056 | Finish your work on hand don't be greedy. 057 | For success today, look first to yourself. 058 | Your fortune is as sweet as a cookie. 059 | Integrity is the essence of everything successful. 060 | If you're happy, you're successful. 061 | You will always be surrounded by true friends 062 | Believing that you are beautiful will make you appear beautiful to others around you. 063 | Happiness comes from a good life. 064 | Before trying to please others think of what makes you happy. 065 | When hungry, order more Chinese food. 066 | Your golden opportunity is coming shortly. 067 | For hate is never conquered by hate. Hate is conquered by love . 068 | You will make many changes before settling down happily. 069 | A man is born to live and not prepare to live. 070 | You cannot become rich except by enriching others. 071 | Don't pursue happiness - create it. 072 | You will be successful in love. 073 | All your fingers can't be of the same length. 074 | Wise sayings often fall on barren ground, but a kind word is never thrown away. 075 | A lifetime of happiness is in store for you. 076 | It is very possible that you will achieve greatness in your lifetime. 077 | Be tactful; overlook your own opportunity. 078 | You are the controller of your destiny. 079 | Everything happens for a reason. 080 | How can you have a beautiful ending without making beautiful mistakes. 081 | You can open doors with your charm and patience. 082 | Welcome the change coming into your life. 083 | There will be a happy romance for you shortly. 084 | Your fondest dream will come true within this year. 085 | You have a deep interest in all that is artistic. 086 | Your emotional nature is strong and sensitive. 087 | A letter of great importance may reach you any day now. 088 | Good health will be yours for a long time. 089 | You will become better acquainted with a coworker. 090 | To be old and wise, you must first be young and stupid. 091 | Failure is only the opportunity to begin again more intelligently. 092 | Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching. 093 | Conquer your fears or they will conquer you. 094 | You are a lover of words; One day you will write a book. 095 | In this life it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich. 096 | Fear can keep us up all night long, but faith makes one fine pillow. 097 | Seek out the significance of your problem at this time. Try to understand. 098 | Never upset the driver of the car you're in; they're the master of your destiny until you get home. 099 | He who slithers among the ground is not always a foe. 100 | You learn from your mistakes, you will learn a lot today. 101 | You only need look to your own reflection for inspiration. Because you are Beautiful! 102 | You are not judged by your efforts you put in; you are judged on your performance. 103 | Rivers need springs. 104 | Good news from afar may bring you a welcome visitor. 105 | When all else seems to fail, smile for today and just love someone. 106 | Patience is a virtue, unless its against a brick wall. 107 | When you look down, all you see is dirt, so keep looking up. 108 | If you are afraid to shake the dice, you will never throw a six. 109 | Even if the person who appears most wrong, is also quite often right. 110 | A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study. 111 | Happiness is often a rebound from hard work. 112 | The world may be your oyster, but that doesn't mean you'll get it's pearl. 113 | Your life will be filled with magical moments. 114 | You're true love will show himself to you under the moonlight. 115 | Do not follow where the path may lead. Go where there is no path...and leave a trail 116 | Do not fear what you don't know 117 | The object of your desire comes closer. 118 | You have a flair for adding a fanciful dimension to any story. 119 | If you wish to know the mind of a man, listen to his words 120 | The most useless energy is trying to change what and who God so carefully created. 121 | Do not be covered in sadness or be fooled in happiness they both must exist 122 | You will have unexpected great good luck. 123 | You will have a pleasant surprise 124 | All progress occurs because people dare to be different. 125 | Your ability for accomplishment will be followed by success. 126 | The world is always ready to receive talent with open arms. 127 | Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle. 128 | We can't help everyone. But everyone can help someone. 129 | Every day is a new day. But tomorrow is never promised. 130 | Express yourself: Don't hold back! 131 | It is not necessary to show others you have change; the change will be obvious. 132 | You have a deep appreciation of the arts and music. 133 | If your desires are not extravagant, they will be rewarded. 134 | You try hard, never to fail. You don't, never to win. 135 | Never give up on someone that you don't go a day without thinking about. 136 | It never pays to kick a skunk. 137 | In case of fire, keep calm, pay bill and run. 138 | Next full moon brings an enchanting evening. 139 | Not all closed eye is sleeping nor open eye is seeing. 140 | Impossible is a word only to be found in the dictionary of fools. 141 | You will soon witness a miracle. 142 | The time is alway right to do what is right. 143 | Love is as necessary to human beings as food and shelter. 144 | You will make heads turn. 145 | You are extremely loved. Don't worry :) 146 | If you are never patient, you will never get anything done. If you believe you can do it, you will be rewarded with success. 147 | You will soon embark on a business venture. 148 | You believe in the goodness of man kind. 149 | You will have a long and wealthy life. 150 | You will take a pleasant journey to a place far away. 151 | You are a person of culture. 152 | Keep it simple. The more you say, the less people remember. 153 | Life is like a dog sled team. If you ain't the lead dog, the scenery never changes. 154 | Prosperity makes friends and adversity tries them. 155 | Nothing seems impossible to you. 156 | Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet. 157 | The only certainty is that nothing is certain. 158 | Success is the sum of my unique visions realized by the sweat of perseverance. 159 | When you expect your opponent to yield, you also should avoid hurting him. 160 | Human evolution: 'wider freeway" but narrower viewpoints. 161 | Intelligence is the door to freedom and alert attention is the mother of intelligence. 162 | Back away from individuals who are impulsive. 163 | Enjoyed the meal? Buy one to go too. 164 | You believe in the goodness of mankind. 165 | A big fortune will descend upon you this year. 166 | Now these three remain, faith, hope, and love. The greatest of these is love. 167 | For success today look first to yourself. 168 | Determination is the wake-up call to the human will. 169 | There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge. 170 | A merry heart does good like a medicine. 171 | Whenever possible, keep it simple. 172 | Your dearest wish will come true. 173 | Poverty is no disgrace. 174 | If you don't do it excellently, don't do it at all. 175 | You have an unusual equipment for success, use it properly. 176 | Emotion is energy in motion. 177 | You will soon be honored by someone you respect. 178 | Punctuality is the politeness of kings and the duty of gentle people everywhere. 179 | Your happiness is intertwined with your outlook on life. 180 | Elegant surroundings will soon be yours. 181 | If you feel you are right, stand firmly by your convictions. 182 | Your smile brings happiness to everyone you meet. 183 | Instead of worrying and agonizing, move ahead constructively. 184 | Do you believe? Endurance and persistence will be rewarded. 185 | A new business venture is on the horizon. 186 | Never underestimate the power of the human touch. 187 | Hold on to the past but eventually, let the times go and keep the memories into the present. 188 | Truth is an unpopular subject. Because it is unquestionably correct. 189 | The most important thing in communication is to hear what isn't being said. 190 | You are broad minded and socially active. 191 | Your dearest dream is coming true. God looks after you especially. 192 | You will receive some high prize or award. 193 | Your present question marks are going to succeed. 194 | You have a fine capacity for the enjoyment of life. 195 | You will live long and enjoy life. 196 | An admirer is concealing his/her affection for you. 197 | A wish is what makes life happen when you dream of rose petals. 198 | Love can turn cottage into a golden palace. 199 | Lend your money and lose your friend. 200 | You will kiss your crush.
